descripcion: London, city, capital of the United Kingdom. It is among the oldest of the worldâ€™s great cities. LONDON IS A DIVERSE, COLOURFUL, COSMOPOLITAN, DAZZLING CITY. A city that has a history of more than two thousand years, but in which the modern and futuristic merge with a great profusion of arts and shows.
Paris, city and capital of France, situated in the north-central part of the country. THE CITY OF LIGHT, Paris is one of the most influential hubs on the European continent.

Tokyo, city and capital of Tokyo to (metropolis) and of Japan. It is located at the head of Tokyo Bay on the Pacific coast of central Honshu.  TOKYO IS A VIBRANT METROPOLIS with millions of residents and visitors. It offers a rich mix of culture, nature and fun for all tastes and interests.

Venice, city, major seaport, and capital of both the provincia (province) of Venezia and the regione (region) of Veneto, northern Italy. VENICE IS A CITY LIKE NO OTHER. It is an important seaport, a cultural center and a world heritage site. Unique and unforgettable.
